author: Fostine C.
title: CAF : si vous avez un enfant au lycée, n'oubliez pas cette allocation de 462 euros prévue pour août 2025
text:
CAF : si vous avez un enfant au lycée, n’oubliez pas cette allocation de 462 euros prévue pour août 2025
Chaque été, l’allocation de rentrée scolaire permet à près de trois millions de familles de souffler un peu face aux dépenses liées à la rentrée. Mais si vous avez un enfant au lycée, âgé de 16 à 18 ans, attention : contrairement aux élèves du primaire et du collège, le versement ne se fait pas automatiquement. Pour percevoir les 462,33 euros auxquels vous avez droit, une déclaration en ligne est obligatoire. Et sans elle, aucun paiement ne sera effectué.
C’est une subtilité que la Caisse d’Allocations Familiales rappelle chaque année, mais qui passe parfois inaperçue. Les lycéens étant en âge de quitter l’école ou de commencer un apprentissage, la CAF ne peut plus supposer qu’ils sont toujours scolarisés. Elle demande donc aux parents de confirmer cette information, via leur espace personnel en ligne. Cette déclaration peut être faite depuis le 15 juillet, mais il est fortement recommandé de ne pas attendre. Le versement de l’allocation débutera à la mi-août, et un oubli pourrait retarder, voire annuler, le paiement.
CAF : comment effectuer la déclaration pour débloquer l’allocation de rentrée scolaire ?
La démarche est pourtant simple et rapide. Une fois connecté sur le site caf.fr ou via l’application mobile « CAF – Mon Compte », une alerte en rouge devrait s’afficher en haut de la page d’accueil : « Pour calculer vos droits, nous avons besoin de connaître la situation de votre enfant. Merci de nous le déclarer au plus vite. » Il suffit de cliquer, de cocher quelques cases, puis d’indiquer si votre enfant est toujours scolarisé, apprenti, déscolarisé ou étudiant à l’étranger. Si la scolarité se poursuit, vous devrez aussi renseigner les coordonnées de l’établissement.
Une fois validée, cette
déclaration
permet à la CAF de déclencher le paiement de l’allocation, si
bien sûr votre foyer répond aux conditions de
ressources. Le montant dépend du niveau d’enseignement :
423 euros pour un enfant en primaire, 448 euros pour un collégien,
et 462,33 euros pour un lycéen. Dans un contexte où les dépenses de
rentrée continuent d’augmenter, cette aide peut faire une vraie
différence. D’après l’UFC-Que Choisir, le prix des
fournitures scolaires a grimpé de 2 % en 2025 par rapport
à 2024, et ce malgré les efforts de certaines enseignes pour
contenir les hausses.
Déclaration à la CAF : une étape indispensable pour ne pas perdre l’allocation de rentrée scolaire
Cartables, stylos, cahiers,
calculatrices… La liste est longue et les prix s’envolent
vite, surtout pour les familles avec plusieurs enfants.
L’allocation de rentrée scolaire est justement conçue pour amortir
cette charge. Mais encore faut-il effectuer les démarches à temps.
Un simple oubli, un clic manqué ou une déclaration repoussée à plus
tard, et la
rentrée peut vite s’accompagner de frais non prévus. Ce serait
d’autant plus regrettable que tout est fait pour faciliter
la procédure.
Le plus sage reste donc de ne pas
attendre le dernier moment. Quelques minutes suffisent
pour remplir la déclaration, et s’assurer ainsi de
percevoir cette aide bienvenue avant la rentrée. Pour les
lycéens, cette formalité n’est pas facultative. Sans elle, les 462
euros risquent de rester bloqués. Et en cette période où chaque
euro compte, mieux vaut anticiper que devoir
rattraper.

title: Stand Up for Mental Health: The Impact of Mental Health Matters Hoodies
text:
Mental Health Awareness: A Crucial Conversation
Mental health awareness is more important than ever in today's fast-paced and often stressful world. With increasing numbers of people experiencing mental health challenges, it is crucial to foster open conversations about mental health. By doing so, we can break down the stigma that surrounds mental health issues and encourage individuals to seek the help they need. One effective way to promote mental health awareness is through the use of apparel, such as the "Your Mental Health Matters" hoodie. These hoodies serve as a powerful visual reminder that mental health is a priority and that it is okay to talk about it.
Mental Health Matters: Embracing the Message
Wearing a "Your Mental Health Matters Hoodie" is more than just a fashion statement; it is a declaration of support for mental health awareness. By donning this hoodie, individuals can show their commitment to the cause and inspire others to do the same. The message "Your Mental Health Matters" is a reminder that everyone deserves to feel seen, heard, and supported in their mental health journey. It is a call to action for individuals to take care of their mental health and to encourage others to do the same.
Mental Health Apparel: A Tool for Change
Mental health apparel, such as the "Your Mental Health Matters" hoodie, plays a significant role in raising awareness and promoting mental health. These items serve as conversation starters, allowing individuals to share their experiences and offer support to others. By wearing mental health apparel, individuals can help normalize the conversation around mental health and reduce the stigma that often prevents people from seeking help. Additionally, the proceeds from the sale of mental health apparel often go towards supporting mental health organizations and initiatives, furthering the impact of these items.
Mental Health Support: Building a Community
One of the most powerful aspects of the "Your Mental Health Matters" hoodie is its ability to foster a sense of community and support. When people see others wearing the hoodie, they are reminded that they are not alone in their mental health struggles. This sense of solidarity can be incredibly comforting and empowering, encouraging individuals to reach out for help and support. By creating a visible network of mental health advocates, the "Your Mental Health Matters" hoodie helps to build a community that is dedicated to promoting mental health and well-being.
Taking Care of Your Mental Health: Practical Tips
While wearing a "Your Mental Health Matters" hoodie is a powerful way to show support for mental health awareness, it is also essential to take practical steps to care for your mental health. Here are some tips to help you maintain your mental well-being:
- Stay connected with friends and family: Social support is crucial for mental health. Make an effort to stay in touch with loved ones, even if it's just through a phone call or text message.
- Practice self-care: Take time to engage in activities that bring you joy and relaxation, such as reading, exercising, or spending time in nature.
- Seek professional help: If you are struggling with your mental health, don't hesitate to reach out to a mental health professional for support and guidance.
- Set boundaries: Learn to say no and prioritize your well-being. It's okay to take a step back from commitments that are causing you stress.
- Stay informed: Educate yourself about mental health and the resources available to you. Knowledge is power, and understanding your mental health can help you take control of it.
The Impact of Mental Health Matters Hoodies: Real Stories
The "Your Mental Health Matters" hoodie has made a tangible impact on the lives of many individuals. Here are a few real stories from people who have experienced the positive effects of wearing this powerful piece of apparel:
Jane, a college student, shared how wearing her "Your Mental Health Matters" hoodie helped her feel more confident in discussing her mental health struggles with her peers. She found that the hoodie sparked conversations about mental health and allowed her to connect with others who were going through similar experiences.
Tom, a mental health advocate, explained how the hoodie helped him raise awareness about mental health in his community. By wearing the hoodie to events and gatherings, he was able to start meaningful conversations and provide valuable resources to those in need.
Emily, a mother of two, recounted how the hoodie served as a reminder to prioritize her mental health. As a busy parent, she often found it challenging to take time for herself. However, the message on the hoodie encouraged her to practice self-care and seek support when needed.
Conclusion: Stand Up for Mental Health
In conclusion, the "Your Mental Health Matters" hoodie is a powerful tool for promoting mental health awareness and support. By wearing this hoodie, individuals can make a statement about the importance of mental health and inspire others to do the same. The hoodie serves as a reminder that mental health matters and that it is essential to take care of ourselves and each other. By fostering open conversations, reducing stigma, and building a supportive community, we can make a significant impact on mental health awareness and well-being. Stand up for mental health and wear your "Your Mental Health Matters" hoodie with pride.

author: Tim Levin
title: Waymo Hits 200,000 Paid Trips Per Week Before Tesla Even Gets Started
text:
Waymo Hits 200,000 Paid Trips Per Week Before Tesla Even Gets Started
Waymo runs driverless taxis in San Francisco, Los Angeles and Phoenix. Tesla isn't anywhere yet.
- Waymo announced that it now does 200,000 paid autonomous rides per week. That's double what it said six months ago.
- Waymo operates self-driving taxis in Los Angeles, Phoenix and San Francisco.
- After years of broken promises around self-driving cars, Tesla plans to start an autonomous ride-hailing service in Austin this summer.
In the race to lead the autonomous vehicle space—and maybe even the future of transportation—Google's Waymo has about a 100-mile head start. The self-driving taxi division just hit a new milestone: over 200,000 paid rides per week through its Waymo One service.
If this feels like deja-vu, that's because it was only in August that Waymo announced it was doing
100,000 paid rides per week. The company has grown rides by 20 times in less than two years, Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai said in a Thursday post on X announcing the news.
That means the gulf between Waymo and Tesla, which has been making huge promises around autonomous driving for years, feels bigger than ever. Tesla CEO Elon Musk has said his company would sell a self-driving car "soon"
since at least 2016, but you still can't take a nap in the driver's seat of your Model Y. (Well, while it's moving, at least.)
Last year,
Tesla revealed the Cybercab, a purpose-built robotaxi without a steering wheel or pedals that the automaker says will hit production by 2026. But the truest test of the automaker's self-driving ambitions will come far sooner than that. Musk announced on a recent earnings call that, starting in June, the company will deploy driverless Teslas in Austin, Texas. People will be able to order rides through an app, as they do for Waymo or Uber.
After Austin, Musk says the service will swiftly expand to other cities. But, again, he's made these claims for years. And, to date, Tesla hasn't yet proved it can make a car that drives itself without supervision in public.
Musk's killer app may be cost and scale. Teslas only use cameras to "see" the world, while Waymos rely on a wider array of more expensive sensors and highly detailed maps of the cities they operate in. (To get a sense of the costs involved here, just know that Waymo closed a $5.6 billion funding round last year.) If Tesla can achieve the same reliability as Waymo with cars you can buy for $40,000 or $50,000—a big "if"—that's a big deal. But so far, while Tesla has been ironing out the kinks, Waymo has cemented itself as the driverless taxi company in the U.S.
One of the OGs of the autonomous-vehicle industry, Google (now under parent company Alphabet) started researching self-driving cars in 2009 and launched Waymo in 2016. Today, Waymo has autonomous, electric Jaguars on the road in San Francisco, Los Angeles and Phoenix. Next up: deployment in Atlanta and Austin on the Uber platform, and Miami too.

title: 上海徐汇区招募"人工智能+城市治理"解决方案 --经济·科技--人民网
text:
上海徐汇区招募“人工智能+城市治理”解决方案
2025年04月17日06:18 | 来源：
人民网－人民日报
小字号
本报上海4月16日电 （记者田泓）4月16日，上海市徐汇区发布六大“人工智能+城市治理”场景，并启动五大赛道揭榜挂帅计划。
六大场景包含了实景三维助力高效能治理、“三体城市”治理系统、电动自行车充电安全管理、消防安全、政务服务大厅2.0、数字经济产业发展平台等领域。
徐汇区同步发布五大赛道揭榜需求，面向全球招募量子城市治理解决方案。未来3年，徐汇区计划投入5亿元扶持资金，吸引全球顶尖团队共建人工智能治理开放生态。
依托“模速空间”“数链空间”等创新载体，徐汇区已吸引133家人工智能及区块链企业落地，形成从数据标注、算法训练到场景落地的完整产业链。此次发布的“经创云枢”平台，更将联动长三角超200家科研院所，共建AI治理技术联盟。
《 人民日报 》（ 2025年04月17日 14 版）
(责编：白宇、卫嘉)
